summary: Implements a runner that orchestrates the software composition analysis workflow: discovers supported package files, prepares and optionally persists them, resolves storage keys, uploads the packages to a remote service, and triggers the scan, aggregating results into a report.
business_intent: Enable automated detection of vulnerable or non‑compliant third‑party dependencies in codebases by integrating SCA scanning into CI/CD pipelines and reporting findings to the Bridgecrew platform.
